summary: Previous authorization issues were addressed with explicit role enforcement and safe role access, and no new blocking problems were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Route does not explicitly enforce member/operator/admin roles; any authenticated user could access if requireAuth doesn't enforce roles.
previous_issues_status.notes: Added requireVelocityRole middleware enforcing allowed roles.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Accessing req.caller.roles without a null/undefined guard can throw, causing a 500 and bypassing proper authorization handling.
previous_issues_status.notes: Roles are now accessed with a null-safe guard (req.caller?.roles ?? []).
